website_summaries.verdict: A durable tent that can withstand even severe storms without leaking or breaking.
pros: Nearly 7 feet high in the center
Roomy utility pockets and gear loft offer gear storage
Rain fly extends far beyond windows so no water leaks in
cons: Can't close the windows from inside the tent

website_summaries.verdict: Two wide doors ensure this tunnel-style tent is well ventilated, while waterproofing and good design keep water out.
pros: Designed with 2 wide doors, lined with micro mesh for insect defense
Bathtub style flooring keeps water out

customer_reviews.title: good tent.
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is ok. Wish the window flaps could open up from the inside though as its a design flaw in my opinion. Easy two person set up. we purchased a tarp to go underneath to try and protect it more. 2 entrances- although we only use one. nice size for 3 people and 2 dogs and all the gear that goes with us. one note is to be careful who you order from. we were scammed from a private seller.... as were many others. Amazon was decent in trying to make it right
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: absoluetly love this tent it is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: absoluetly love this tent it is HUGE! It's easy to set up and has lots of ventilation. My husband and I are building off the grid and we put a queen size mattress in ours and the doors are so big we could slide the bed right in no wedging or folding needed, we are in southern Oregon and have been using just a comforter to stay warm and it drops down to 40 degrees or so at night. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K.

customer_reviews.title: This tent took a direct typhoon hit and survived!
customer_reviews.text: First time we used this tent we camped at 1500 meters on top of a hill in Nagano, Japan. The second day in we took a direct hit from a typhoon. No, we didnt tough it out. With two small kids, my wife and I evacuated to the nearby campground lodge when it got bad and left our tent to the merciless wind and rain. I figured it would at least be blown if not torn to shreds but come morning it was still standing! No damage. Not only that, it was completely dry inside. No water at all. I was amazed. This tent stood up to 120+ kph wind without a scratch. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alan V. Martinsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tent, easy to assemble, spacious with lots of head room. Durable construction too. Excellent ventilation, came wit a great tent light. The only reasons I gave it four stars are: -There is exterior vestibule, which would have been a nice feature for removing shoes when it's raining and leaving them outside, yet covered. -The fibreglass poles are really long and that concerns me a bit. I would have rather paid a bit more and had aluminum poles for something this large. -Minor: there were no instructions at all. It wasn't an overly complicated tent but instructions would have been helpful for the first time set up. Nonetheless, excellent value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lava

customer_reviews.title: Great tent. Holds up in high winds and stays ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Holds up in high winds and stays dry in rain. I'm 6'3 and can stand up straight in center of big room. Many other details are covered by other reviews. My favorite is the superb customer service. Two of the white poles got bent, due to my negligence. I left a message w the customer service line on the inside of tent bag. They immediately sent me two new poles, no questions asked...couldn't be happier with the purchase. It is also fairly straight forward to set up. Did it with 2 people in 15 minutes 1st time
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: great tent but needs some instructions on how to set ...
customer_reviews.text: great tent but needs some instructions on how to set up. I called them and they directed me to a youtube video of a costumer who set up the tent. It wasn't very helpful so I recommended instructions with pictures. They replied with "thanks for trying to help". For a $300.00 tent at least we could get a couple of pictures or something.
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Stephanie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: sooo roomy!
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint would be the fact that the windows can be only operated (open and close) from the outside. Other than that... maybe the fact that the "ground sticks"(sorry don't remember the name of this things ;)) are too shorts... but other than that the tent is great... it's so big it's awesome! It took the rain really well, no leaks... and it took the wind really well although we were afraid of the wind because of the short "ground sticks"... It's nice! I'm not use to camping and I can spend the whole weekend here with no problem. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Best tent I ever had or seen
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this tent makes it well worth the money. Two adults two kids and a dog fit well. I wish I got the bugger 11/12 person model but at the time I was afraid it would be too big for most campgrounds( finding a flat lot that size). It isnt too big and has held up well for several dats at a time in strong wind and rain. The Windows only closing on the outside is not a design flaw. It makes it completely waterproof. Best tent ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Tent was fantastic in a week long torrential downpour
customer_reviews.text: Tent was fantastic in a week long torrential downpour. HOWEVER, with the way that the entrances are set up, if you try to enter or exit while it's raining there will be major leakage into the tent.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: this tent is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome, impressive, huge! Inaugural use was a cold rainy day and stayed perfectly dry inside. Love the two "rooms" which let us keep our clothes and dirties in one section and helped keep the bedroom nice and clean. Super easy to set up. We got a big tarp to go under.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Lots of rain/wind storms ZERO LEAKS.
customer_reviews.text: Set the tent up pre-camping trip to make sure all the parts were there and in good shape, we had zero issues, It rained off and on for almost two weeks and stormed twice, Zero Leaks! Post camping trip,, we spent a week camping and had a very strong rain/wind storm with very cold temperatures,,, ZERO leaks, Sleeps 9/10?? I'm not that close to 9/10 people. But very comfortable for me and my wife.
customer_reviews.author: BLJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality tent at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tent at a great price! VERY roomy for our family, but that is what we wanted with two children and a dog. I love that the rainfly comes all the way down to the ground; slept in it during a rainy night and nothing got wet. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Withstands very high wind
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had rain to see how it does, but nothing broke on it with 2 weeks of brutal beach wind. It was bucking and being beaten in during high sustained winds, but did not collapse or break a pole or rip a tie. Comes with crappy stakes though. Get yourself some real stakes to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Rain proof, insulated and spacious
customer_reviews.text: This tent is fabulous. Also it did have a zippered slot for an electrical cord ( it’s in the middle where the room divider would go). I didn’t put any sealer on it and it withstood a windy rain. I was able to fit 3 twin and a queen tall (16” high) air mattresses with room to spare for a table with heater and portable toilet. Kept my family of 5 was warm in freezing weather. Didn’t have any condensation inside in the morning because of good ventilation. One window has firm foam edges and props to extend it out for ventilation but still keeping rain out.
customer_reviews.author: workingmom

customer_reviews.title: Good tent
customer_reviews.text: The reason I only gave four star it’s because the tent takes a long time to set up. Other than that it’s a good quality tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best rain tent I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the tent because we wanted something to stand up to the the rain camping in Florida. This tent is amazing when it comes to being water proof. We have camped twice with it and both times it rained hard not a drop inside bravo I would give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Construction Updated
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I could tell the high quality of this tent I am a seamstress and very impressed by the construction and strong material. With easy setup it is perfect. There is so much room. Update : We have put the tent up within 25 minutes for the very first time. It was so easy we did not need to read instructions. This is day 3 sleeping in very hot humid weather. This tents circulates air. At night it is chilly, we close up the windows and we are warm. Rain and thunder storm no problems. This is such a great buy. So much room.
customer_reviews.author: CJP

customer_reviews.title: Best tent ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tent for family/car camping Plenty of space Not a drop of water inside the tent during two day downpour Heavy duty tarp-like floor is great There is so much stuff we love about this tent Having fullsize rainfly - Wow!! - what a difference just wow! Whole setup process is 2 person operation but it is still doable to pitch this tent by yourself. Did I mention space ... A lot of it.
customer_reviews.author: bukajek

customer_reviews.title: No leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a tent that doesn't become a swimming pool during storms! The rain fly is a bit of a struggle to put on but you won't get wet.
customer_reviews.author: eaglestail

customer_reviews.title: NTK Arizona GT 9 to 10 Person tent
customer_reviews.text: I chose this tent because of all the reviews I read, this is the only company where there were no leak complaints, no need to seal any seams, and incredibly durable. This is a small family owned company who truly takes pride in their product. I would highly recommend to anyone who is serious about camping, and look for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lembcrickas

customer_reviews.title: Great for a rustic family of 3
customer_reviews.text: Rain cannot penetrate this. Bone dry without waterproofing Need a 20x20 ft tarp to fold underneath sold separately, $30 @menards. Takes time for 1st attempt but easy and there are reviews online. Counterintuitive that the fly unzips from outside only, but still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tent I have seen!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who is living in thus tent. It doesn’t leak and does great in Florida heat, rain and wind.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn E. Casseday

customer_reviews.title: Nice a roomy.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble this tent by myself. I love how big it is yet I’m able to carry the bag w/poles with one hand. I’ve included a video with more information.
customer_reviews.author: E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until a pole broke
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent! Setup instruction is easy to follow, but may need about 2 persons to set up because it is big. I love the height and space inside, plus there are 2 doors. We stayed dry when it rained. It keeps the heat inside as well. However, by our third use, the red pole gave in and broke while we were camping. My resourceful husband used some wires and rope that he had at the time to put a temporary fix. It was a really good tent, except when this happened. Trying to re-order spare parts in the website, but it seems to be out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Mye808

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof—great quality—one hand zipper!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this tent. Have stayed in it for about two week on and off. Waterproof! Which is why I bought it! I research for months! Very happy! I wish I would have gotten the 14 person in hopes I could have had a card table inside. But very nice for a mom and two kiddos. We overpack—lol. One queen and two twin mattress, plus our stuff. Such a step up from our other tents—Coleman and Ozark. Very waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda O.

customer_reviews.title: Great family tent
customer_reviews.text: purchased this tent recently, the tent is large enough for 3 queen air mattress' and still have a little room to move around. it has a room divider. plenty of windows for air circulation. A great feature on this tent is the rain-fly, it goes all the way to the ground. on a recent camping trip a storm passed over with winds in excess of 20 mph. with rain coming down sideways, not one drop came in the tent. Driest tent i have ever owned. we are very happy with this tent.
customer_reviews.author: ElectricEye

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years now, family camping and hunting, holds up to Colorado winter weather no problems yet. It’s a total pain to set up with one person so I only use it if we or I stay somewhere for more than 1 night.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best FAMILY Tent EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: First 2 pictures are this year and the 3rd is from last year. Poured rain on us one trip that it doused our roaring fire within 20 minutes. Of course I was concerned for the tent and our brood of kids. No worries, the tent didn't leak a drip. I felt so safe and secure inside this tent. There are some many awesome features inside and out that increase it's likability like awnings, two doors, pockets inside the tent, the carrying duffel bag...Best purchase for camping I've made.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us.
customer_reviews.text: This tent was perfect for us. It held up against some pretty strong winds and the vents helped in the heat. We are a family of 4 and the tent held 3 cots and a travel crib comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Holds 10 people if they like each other. A lot. Excellent tent for a family.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tent. 10 people? Sure, if they really like each other.
customer_reviews.author: IT Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent!
customer_reviews.text: First time camping. I am 5'2" petite woman and camp with 6 and 10 yr old kids (and Boy Scouts). Set up tent as sun going down/barely any light, and help of cub scout leader. And was relatively easy. Especially because we could not find directions and barely see. Everyone was shocked that I didn't by a 3 minute pop up. But I bought the Arizona just in case it rained. Loved the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious and roomy. I used this over a 4 day trip with lots of rain. The tent stayed very dry. the only downside of this tent is that their is no awning to cover the doors. But a small tarp solved this easily.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Grasser

customer_reviews.title: Look no further- buy this tent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Buy this tent. I researched extensively and during our first camping trip we had severe thunderstorms throughout the night with heavy rain. The family stayed dry and our children slept well. I can't say enough about the quality and engineering of this tent. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend this tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. Easy to setup and tons of room. Very well designed for unpreditable weather. I have taken it on three campouts so far. It held up well in extreme wind and rain. In a windstorm, a tent pole did splinter and still held up. Called customer service and they sent me a replacement pole 2 days later. Glad they have a lifetime warranty on the poles! The only thing i changed is I upgraded the tent stakes to make it easier to attach and detach the rain fly without having to remove stakes. Love having the sun room during the day. Would definitely recommend this tent for family camping.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 season family tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up with plenty of room for 4 adults and two dogs. We were able to stay comfortable even when the outside temperatures dipped in to the 20s. Nice large carry bag made it easy to pack up and compression straps keep it neat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tent is the best I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This tent is the best I’ve ever bought. Straight out of the box my wife and I were able to put this up in 15 minutes flat with everything. The quality of the materials is superb. It might be an expensive tent but I’m not feeling any buyers remorse with this. Going camping with it this weekend so I’ll write a follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Dominguez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Really huge, really weatherproof.
customer_reviews.text: We received the tent yesterday and immediately erected it on our porch (it just fits, the tent is really huge). Assembly was easily done together with my daugter in maybe 15min. Tonight we test camped there (what was a lot of fun btw.) and in the morning had some really serious South Carolina downpour. Everything stayed dry, really nice. :-) Looking forward to our first trip with it.
customer_reviews.author: Der Konsument

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent so much!! Easy to set up, and so roomy. I’ve had it for a year now and can think of one complaint. We are from the northeast so no crazy weather conditions but it seems so sturdy I would use it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tent. First time it rained on & off all weekend, we stayed dry all throughout it all. One person can set it up without any problem. There was two of us and we had it complete in about 10mins. I would recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nadenoff

customer_reviews.title: we absolutely loved this tent
customer_reviews.text: we are a family of just 3 people ... we absolutely loved this tent ... !!!! saying that it will fit 10 people is a bit of a stretch , but with us that's a non issue
customer_reviews.author: victor garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent!!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is wonderful. Lots of room for the family and the dog. Even though it is pretty big it is easy to set up. It only takes my husband and I maybe 10-15 mins. I love that the fly comes all the way down so in certain areas we camp moisture can’t get in. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: We used our tent for the first time in the rain. The inside of the tent is huge and completely water proof. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent, a bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I thought. We had two adults and 2 children (ages 5, 6) and our Lab sleep very comfortable in this tent. The kids slept on a bunk bed cot which helped with the room.
customer_reviews.author: Goldsmith/Thomas

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality! Did not last the first nigh. Holes in bottom of tent the first use even with a heavy vinyl trap under the tent. Does not stand up to the Texas wind either. It blew away twice!! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: held up under 3 days of rain.  not one drop of water in our tent
customer_reviews.text: Used this tent to camp for 7 days in Northern Wisconsin in August. Tons of room. Easy to set-up. EXCELLENT RAIN FLY! It rained for 3 days and we didn't have a drop in our tent. The windows and vents provide tons of ventilation. Totally worth the $$
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tent! I highly recommend it. We had it camping in a severe thunderstorm and it didn't leak or budge at all. The only downside is that the windows open from the outside but this is a small price to pay for such a well made and storm-proof tent,
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great weatherproof tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. Took it on a 4 day 3 night camping trip and it rained all 4 days. No leaks at all. Has plenty of room for two queen size mattresses then some. Easy to setup and take down with two people.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: This job is a lot bigger than you think. I think we can invite all the neighbors over.
customer_reviews.author: Thai 1 On

customer_reviews.title: Great tent replacement choice.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. Camping confidence is high with this tent. My family camps mainly in warm weather which is right in line with the great ventilation this tent offers. Staying dry is the biggest reason for having a tent and I've never owned a tent that didn't leak. This maybe the first. It has survived mild weather and looks to be built to handle the task.
customer_reviews.author: m. l. oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Best tent I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have been camping four times with this tent and it is fantastic. We went and it poured down rain for 24 hours straight and not a drop of water. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finest tent I've seen anywhere close to this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent! I have used it about 20 times. Easy to put up and down, vents well with plenty of room in side.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love this tent, easy to set up. Family of 4 - 2 kids below 6.
customer_reviews.author: Radu Patruta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best, most secure family sized tent I have ever owned! The fabric feels nice and durable.
customer_reviews.author: myaerie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, easy to erect, easy to take down. Nothing not to like.
customer_reviews.author: TONI THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tent
customer_reviews.text: Tested under a storm in South Carolina. No water leaks at all. Easy to install and fold back.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe

customer_reviews.title: Held up
customer_reviews.text: Tent held up well in Florida down pour and easy to adjust the tent posts if needed
customer_reviews.author: dOLORES dOHERTY

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Roomie, well made some what easy to set up when you are a newbie.
customer_reviews.author: Music enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Got caught in a five gallon bucket kind of thunder ...
customer_reviews.text: Got caught in a five gallon bucket kind of thunder storm our first time using this....VERY impressed....was dry as a bone inside all weekend.
customer_reviews.author: CindyLou Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent. It has held up well for us ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Tent. It has held up well for us on a couple of trips. The only thing I don't like is my own inability to fold it properly to put it back into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than normal fabric. This tent is very roomy and has multiple ways you can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Casey R Watts

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pitch this large tent, comfortable, our yorkies love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tent iv'e owned!
customer_reviews.text: First time we took it out we got rained on pretty good. Not a single drop of water came in the tent AND we did not experience any drafts at all. Love this tent, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted from a large car camping tent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent roomy tent that can either be breezy and very open or button down nicely for keeping all dry in rain. Simply great design and build.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Patterson

customer_reviews.title: GT 9 to 10 person tent.
customer_reviews.text: The tent works great. The only thing that I would like to have was some instructions for putting the tent up for the first time. The rain cover worked great my tent stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good price, quality and easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Family of 4 easily stayed in this tent, quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Flick

customer_reviews.title: Great customer
customer_reviews.text: Rained the whole camping trip. Dry as a bone inside. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: dsvacha1

customer_reviews.title: Camped for 5 rainy days however the tent stayed dry ...
customer_reviews.text: Camped for 5 rainy days however the tent stayed dry inside...did use a water shield spray to prep tent beforehand
customer_reviews.author: susan arthur

customer_reviews.title: The tent was fairly easy to set up and took about 20 minutes the ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new tent as our old one was 36 yrs old! We wanted something leak proof for our family of 4. The tent was fairly easy to set up and took about 20 minutes the first time. We set up the fly without the guy lines, it rained for 27 hrs, with some very heavy downpours...NOT A LEAK! The tent is very roomy for our family of 4, and plenty of room for our toddlers to play!
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding tent well thought out construction camped with it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding tent well thought out construction camped with it on bohia Honda in the keys for 2 weeks it never let me down
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy ,not to hard to set up, kept us dry for two rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This tent is awesome. It rained 2 times while we camped and ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is awesome. It rained 2 times while we camped and our tent was perfectly dry. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, lots of room. Love how rainfly covers entire tent. Very weather-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is sturdy enough too
customer_reviews.text: Besides all the compliments we get on this tent, we used it a few times this year and each time it ended up raining, once was heavy rain for quite a while... every time bone dry inside. it is sturdy enough too, to where you wont need to tie down all the strings/straps .. unless youre camping in the tundra with 40mph winds. It is easy enough to set up too.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: We have used our new tent once. It did take quite a bit longer to set up than our old one of a similar size. However, the fly is incredible! It really holds the temp inside. I think we'd be able to take this out in the winter and stay warm!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Successfully held up in rainstorms and high winds, did not leak water into the tent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JENNY D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice spacious tent
customer_reviews.text: Nice spacious tent. Set up is fairly easy. It rained the first night and had no issues. It's worth the money. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, but I wish I could open windows from the inside
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome tent - super spacious - and it's easy to setup (I did it by myself once - a little tricky but possible). My 15 year old son loved having his 'own room'. My only gripe is when the tent fly is on, you can't get any circulation going from the inside. You have to go outside the tent to roll up the parts of the fly you want open, and outside again if it gets cold and you want them back down.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple times this year, but it's super easy to put up and take down, I love how much space there is in it. I haven't had to use it in the rain or anything yet either, but it looks and feels like it would withstand a good amount of water. I would buy this again if needed. I will update my review if anything changes as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: ,Leslie B Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! I really like how it was made. Very roomy. Camped for 15 days for the test run. Handles wind well, rained 3 days with no problems. Excellent ventilation. I did add a tarp as a floor liner just to extend the life. Only drawback was you can't open a window from inside. Setup and taken down by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tent was hands down the best tent especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: This tent was hands down the best tent especially for the price! It was pretty easy to put together and color coordinated! My husband put it up all by himself while I took my daughter to the bathroom. It was that fast! Very roomy and the doors were big too to help with loading coolers and air mattress in and out. We kept it covered as the weather was in the 30's during the night. We used the Mr. Heater and it got nice and cozy inside. LOVE IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah White-Parks

customer_reviews.title: seemed like a daunting task at first
customer_reviews.text: In search of a bigger tent, yet one that was waterproof, seemed like a daunting task at first. After hours of research and contemplation, we went with this tent based on reviews. Its exactly what we wanted, something big enough for two adults and three large dogs. Also waterproof-it rained a little when we went camping and we had the fly on, nothing got wet. The bottom comes up probably a foot too so if you happen to have water on the ground, the inside would still stay dry. Yes, it was a little pricey, but as I've learned - you get what you pay for. We decided the extra money spent would be worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: basically 2 tents in one. Very versatile. Haven't tried in rain yet, but don't really want to camp in rain anyway! easy set up. I can do it alone, but putting away is easier with 2. Color coded poles help. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best tent I've ever had. Easy set up. VERY durable
customer_reviews.author: Dark Dog

customer_reviews.title: Sweetness!
customer_reviews.text: Superb awesomeness radness! Easy to put up and take down. Family of 4, plenty of room. Looks good, real good.
customer_reviews.author: The III

customer_reviews.title: Best tent we have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is BY FAR the best tent we have ever owned. We were dry and warm and our kids enjoyed having their own entry. It is really very easy to put up as well as take down. I really appreciate that everything can easily fit back into the carrying bag. We've always been annoyed at poor quality carrying bags and have had to replace those before the actual tent. I doubt that will be the case. We enjoy family camping and we have been rained out more than once and made having a rain proof tent a major priority. This tent DID NOT disappoint! We love it! Can't wait to take it out again in a couple weeks!
customer_reviews.author: April Bonine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent! Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tent! Easy to set up, color coated four stick frame. Total rain fly coverage. Smaller size nine person oppose to the bulky, heavy framed other versions which is great for two - four people plus gear and a yeti full of cold beer and whiskey!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is what the family needs to "GET OFF THE COUCH AND COMMUNE WITH NATURE!"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arizona gt tent by ntk.
customer_reviews.text: tent is for about 4 people. much smaller than advertised. Instructions were short and vague. being our first tent, we did not know what some of the items were, or what to do with them. the bag it came in was way too small to get the items back in the bag. I bought a large bag to put most of the tent items in. It is up for sale at this time.
customer_reviews.author: leon massey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tent!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely L-O-V-E this tent!! So nice and roomy inside. Lots of pockets for putting things, has room divider, and electrical/gas cord port on side of tent. And we love how the rain fly covers the _WHOLE_ entire tent. Worth every penny. Very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: NTK Arizona GT 9 to 10 Person 17.4 by 8 Foot Sport Camping Tent 100% Waterproof 2500mm Tent
feature_bullets: RATED #6 FOR THE BEST FAMILY TENT IN THE USA IN 2016. SPACIOUS 9 to 10 Person (aduls/kids), 2 Rooms, 2 Doors, 3 Windows Tent Designed for Easy Assembly with color coded poles. Super 6.2 FT height for maximum comfort.

FULL COVERAGE RAINFLY: Double layer 190T polyester laminated with polyurethane 2500 mm water column, partially aluminium, heat-welded PU seam sealed and UV protection, Large covered mesh vents provide even more ventilation. Inner tent: Large D-style doors with mosquito mesh for great views and ventilation. Roomy utility pockets and gear loft for gear storage.
FRAME: 100% virgin NANO-FLEX shock corded fiber glass rods with improved diameter and double gold plated ferrules. Aluminium Pin-and-ring system for easy and quick setup.

MOSQUITO MESH: Inner tent fully breathable with generous Ultra-thin polyester no-see style mesh keeps you safe from smallest insects and mosquitos while offering some privacy from side view (when not using the rainfly).

FLOOR MATERIAL AND DESIGN: Heavy duty anti-fungus seamless polyethylene with inner silver coated layer keeps you dry and protected enhanced by the unique element barrier bathtub-style construction (you won't wake up in a puddle!). Security: Meets CPAI-84 flammability requirements. Heavy duty carry bag with compression straps and ID label to personalize your tent.
